dmca.title: [ABUSE] Prevention of a copyright violation
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 20, 2005 10:30 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; customers@madesite.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Prevention of a copyright violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Prevention of a copyright violation
Date: Mon, 20 Jun 2005 21:06:17 +0000
From: Customers <customers@madesite.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

 Hello

I am a legal assistant of madesite.com . I would like to prevent a copyright
violation from your side by providing you with the following notice.

We have found that one of your hosted webpages (boards) (direct URL is
http://www.softmatic.info) provides a huge number of warez designs. A lot of
ripped and stolen web design materials are under our copyright.

Thank you and looking forward for your answer.
- ----
Very truly yours,
Ryan Cathcart
Legal assistant
Artvertex, Inc.
Tel: 19174770358
FAX: 19175913014


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCtuD2vK/XpJs6oyURAgBAAJoDNDAolHveGRZx6P1rvvETZSLv9wCeNQ4t
uw2a5r918jMYsM89FC5wELw=
=Khkc
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
